Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant that is healthy with enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that lacks water and shows signs of not growing well.
The student can illustrate a plant that lacks light and shows signs of not growing well.
The student can identify and depict patterns showing that without water or light, plants struggle to live and grow.
The student can use their illustrations to describe how plants need both water and light to remain healthy.
